roleset.name: stuck to, overly obsessive lover

example.name: Gimme some space!
example.text: You could always say something like " Hi , thank you very much for your message but I have met somebody in the last couple of weeks and feel this might be the one ! " - it would be letting people down gently but you 'd scare off a lot of those guys because they 'd think you were clingy !

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Verbnet entry 22.5.

example.name: I'm stickin with you, cause I'm made out of glue!
example.text: We're always fighting because I always get so emotional and clingy with him and he hates it which is completely understandable.
